message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob!
You can't have it all, let's give you a small share
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still want a decent share!
You're being stingy, I'll take what's mine!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob! I'm willing to compromise.
You're being too generous, I'll take it all!
Time's running out, Bob! I'm taking a firmer stance.
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a little, but not much!
Last chance, Bob! I'm willing to give you most of it.
